name: Compressed Firefox User Profile Data File
summary: A MOZLZ4 file contains Mozilla Firefox user profile data saved in the mozlz4 format. It stores various profile data and settings, which may be information about default search engines, home page configuration, toolbar layout, and saved passwords.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Mozilla Firefox with the "mozlz4-edit" add-on installed

macos.display_name: Mozilla Firefox with the "mozlz4-edit" add-on installed

linux.display_name: Mozilla Firefox with the "mozlz4-edit" add-on installed
